entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. How may I assist you today?
Hi, I'd like to return a pair of cycling shoes and some tires I recently purchased.
Certainly! I can help with that. To start, can you confirm if the shoes or tires have been mounted or installed on a bicycle?
Yes, I did try them out. I installed the tires and I used the shoes for a couple of rides. They have some cleat marks now.

I understand. Because the shoes have cleat marks from being used and the tires were installed, unfortunately, we are unable to accept the return. Items must be in new, unused condition for a refund. Used items with dirty tires cannot be resold as new.
Oh, really? Even though I only used them a couple of times?

Yes, I'm sorry about that. Once items have been mounted and used, even briefly, they are no longer considered in resalable condition under our return policy. Especially since we can see signs of usage, like those cleat marks you mentioned. I know this is disappointing, but we try to be fair to all our customers receiving brand new, unused items.
I see. Well, I guess that makes sense. I should have checked the policy more closely. Thank you for explaining it.
You're welcome! I apologize that I couldn't provide better news. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
No, that's all. Thanks again for your help.
You're very welcome. Have a great day, and thanks for choosing VeloFit!
